thread.title: JPSO: Bridge City man sought in rape of 14-year-old girl
thread.title_full: JPSO: Bridge City man sought in rape of 14-year-old girl - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: JPSO: Bridge City man sought in rape of 14-year-old girl
text:
JEFFERSON PARISH, LA (WVUE) - Arrest warrants for rape and molestation of a juvenile were issued Friday for a man believed to be from Bridge City, according to Jefferson Parish Sheriff Newell Normand.
Trevor Clifton, 36, faces one count each of first-degree rape and molestation of a juvenile. Investigators said the victim, identified only as a 14-year-old female, was raped on multiple occasions over the course of a year.
Attempts to locate Clifton have been unsuccessful. The sheriff said his only known address, which is where the crimes occurred, was on East Claiborne Parkway.
“Investigators have been unable to determine whether or not Clifton owns a vehicle, nor where he is currently residing. Clifton was last seen fleeing the residence on East Claiborne around 6:30 am this morning. Clifton held a knife to himself and stated that he would commit suicide if law enforcement were notified,” the sheriff said in a news release.
Anyone with information is asked to call the Sheriff’s Office or Crimestoppers at (504) 822-1111.
